item.title: 美国航空公司称空客软件问题将影响 340 架飞机
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周五表示，由于大量空客 A320 喷气式客机的软件发生重大变化，预计将出现一些运营延误，并补充说，这一问题影响到该公司约 340 架飞机。【原文：American Airlines said on Friday it expects some operational delays due to a major software change on a significant number of Airbus A320 jets, adding that the issue impacts about 340 aircraft at the carrier.】

item.title: 在美国上市前，CoinShares 拔掉了部分加密 ETF 的插头
item.description: CoinShares 周五申请撤回其推出三只交易所交易基金的计划，因为这家欧洲加密货币公司计划在美国上市前专注于利润率更高的机会。【原文：CoinShares filed on Friday to withdraw its plan to launch three exchange-traded funds, as the European cryptocurrency firm plans to focus on higher-margin opportunities ahead of its U.S. listing.】

item.title: 公告显示，空客 A320 必须在下次飞行前完成维修
item.description: 空中客车公司周五向各航空公司发布的公告显示，受空客A320喷气机全面召回以修复软件缺陷影响的航空公司必须在下一个航班起飞前完成这项工作，不包括任何飞往维修基地的重新定位航班。【原文：Airlines affected by a sweeping recall of Airbus A320 jets to fix a software glitch must carry out the work before the next flight, excluding any re-positioning flight to a repair base, an Airbus bulletin to airlines showed on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华平投资集团将以约 18 亿美元收购猛禽科技公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华平投资集团已同意从投资公司 Thoma Bravo 手中收购猛禽科技公司（Raptor Technologies）的大部分股份，该交易对这家学校安全软件供应商的估值约为 18 亿美元。【原文：Warburg Pincus has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Raptor Technologies from fellow investment firm Thoma Bravo, in a deal that values the school safety software provider at around $1.8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼公司寻求向谷歌数据中心投资高达 50 亿美元，加入人工智能热潮
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的一位高管周五表示，该集团计划向 Alphabet 旗下谷歌的印度人工智能数据中心项目投资高达 50 亿美元，以满足世界上人口最多的国家对数据容量的蓬勃需求。【原文：India's Adani Group plans to invest up to $5 billion in Alphabet-owned Google's India AI data centre project, an executive said on Friday, as it seeks to cash in on booming demand for data capacity in the world's most populous nation.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在飞行控制事故后对 A320 实施重大召回
item.description: 欧洲空中客车公司（Airbus）周五表示，该公司正在下令对其最畅销的 A320 系列喷气式飞机的大量机型立即进行软件更换，据业内人士称，此举将涉及约 6000 架喷气式飞机，即全球机队的一半以上。【原文：Europe's Airbus said on Friday it was ordering an immediate software change on a significant number of its best-selling A320 family of jets in a move that industry sources said would involve some 6,000 jets, or over half the global fleet.】

item.title: 欧盟成员国寻求美国关税协议中的保障措施以保护工业
item.description: 欧盟各国政府希望在欧盟与美国达成的关税协议中设立保障措施和审查条款，以消除美国进口可能激增会损害欧盟工业的担忧。【原文：European Union governments want to put in place safeguards and a review clause in the tariff deal the bloc struck with the United States, to counter concerns that a possible surge of U.S. imports could damage EU industry.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所（CME）故障凸显对恢复能力的担忧，美国期货和期权恢复交易
item.description: 交易所运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团周五表示，在全球期货市场陷入混乱之后，部分市场已经重新开放。【原文：Exchange operator CME Group said on Friday that some markets had reopened after global futures were thrown into chaos when the world's largest exchange operator suffered one of its longest outages in years.】

item.title: 美国经济数据时间表因政府关门而推迟
item.description: 在最近联邦政府停摆期间，负责发布美国经济数据的统计机构已开始更新发布时间表。【原文：The statistical agencies responsible for publishing data about the U.S. economy have begun updating release schedules following the reporting lapse that occurred during the recent federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 俄罗斯威胁全面禁止 WhatsApp
item.description: 据新闻社报道，俄罗斯国家通讯监督机构周五威胁称，如果 WhatsApp 不遵守俄罗斯法律，将对其进行全面封杀。【原文：Russia's state communications watchdog threatened on Friday to block WhatsApp entirely if it fails to comply with Russian law, news agencies reported.】

item.title: Wingtech 在荷兰最高法院对 Nexperia 的裁决提出质疑
item.description: 中国永太科技公司周五表示，已就荷兰最高法院剥夺其 Nexperia 芯片制造子公司控制权的决定提起上诉。【原文：China's Wingtech on Friday said it has appealed decisions stripping it of control of its Nexperia chipmaking subsidiary to the Netherlands' Supreme Court.】

item.title: 在 CME 跌跌不休之前，交易所停运令投资者心惊肉跳
item.description: 全球最大的交易所运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）周五经历了长达数小时的故障，导致其货币平台以及外汇、大宗商品、国债和股票等期货交易停止。【原文：CME Group , the world's biggest exchange operator, experienced an hours-long outage on Friday that halted trade on its currency platform and in futures spanning foreign exchange, commodities, Treasuries and stocks.】

item.title: 阿斯达警告沃尔玛信息技术分拆中断导致销售额恢复增长延迟
item.description: 英国杂货商阿斯达（Asda）警告称，由于完成了与前所有者沃尔玛（Walmart）系统分离的 IT 大修，阿斯达第三季度的销售额受到干扰，预计到 2026 年中期才能恢复基本销售额增长。【原文：British grocer Asda warned it does not expect to return to underlying sales growth until mid-2026 after third quarter sales were dented by disruption linked to the completion of an IT overhaul separating its systems from former owner Walmart.】

item.title: 消息人士称，NatWest 正在就将 Cushon 出售给韦莱韬悦咨询公司进行独家谈判
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，在英国银行收购工作场所养老金提供商 Cushon 仅仅两年之后，NatWest 集团正在就向美国保险经纪公司韦莱韬悦（Willis Towers Watson）出售其所持 Cushon 85% 股份的事宜进行独家谈判。【原文：NatWest Group is in exclusive talks to sell its 85% stake in workplace pension provider Cushon to U.S. insurance broker Willis Towers Watson just two years after the British bank acquired the business, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 加拿大第三季度年化国内生产总值意外增长 2.6
item.description: 周五的数据显示，由于原油出口和政府支出推动了经济活动，加拿大第三季度的经济增长速度远超预期，尽管企业投资和家庭消费因美国关税的不确定性挥之不去而令人失望。【原文：Canada's economy grew at a much faster pace than expected in the third quarter as crude oil exports and government spending boosted economic activity, data showed on Friday, even as business investments and household consumption disappointed due to the lingering uncertainty over U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所称全球期货和期权市场将于美国中部时间 7:30 开盘
item.description: 交易所运营商芝加哥商业交易所集团（CME Group）周五表示，其Globex期货和期权市场于美国中部时间07:00（格林尼治标准时间13:00）预开市，并于美国中部时间07:30开市，此前因其数据中心冷却问题而暂停交易。【原文：Exchange operator CME Group said on Friday that its Globex futures and options markets pre-opened at 07:00 Central Time (1300 GMT) and open at 07:30 CT, after an earlier halt caused by a cooling issue at its data centres.】

item.title: 美国股票基金六周来首次出现单周资金外流
item.description: 在截至11月26日的一周里，美国股票基金出现了六周以来的首次单周资金外流，原因是对科技股估值过高的担忧促使投资者获利了结，并盖过了对美联储下月可能降息的乐观情绪。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed their first weekly outflow in six weeks in the week through November 26, as concerns over lofty tech valuations prompted investors to take profits and overshadowed optimism about a possible Federal Reserve rate cut next month.】

item.title: 星巴克工会升级黑色星期五罢工
item.description: 星巴克工人工会周五表示，该工会正在将无限期罢工升级到 120 多家门店和 85 个城市，要求提高咖啡连锁店的工资和人员配备水平。【原文：The Starbucks workers' union said on Friday it is escalating an indefinite strike to more than 120 stores and 85 cities, demanding higher pay and staffing levels at the coffee chain.】

item.title: 解说员：保持凉爽--高温是数据中心和人工智能面临的主要挑战
item.description: 随着企业越来越多地将信息存储外包并增加使用能源密集型的人工智能，全球数据中心的蓬勃发展为该行业带来了一个关键挑战--如何保持冷却。【原文：The global boom in data centers as companies increasingly outsource information storage and ramp up use of energy-intensive artificial intelligence is creating a key challenge for the industry - how to keep cool.】

item.title: 投资者结束全球股票基金连续九周的买入势头
item.description: 在截至11月26日的一周内，全球股票基金出现了10周以来的首次单周资金外流，原因是对估值紧张（尤其是科技行业）的担忧超过了对美国下月降息预期的乐观情绪。【原文：Global equity funds saw their first weekly outflow in 10 weeks in the week to November 26, as concerns about stretched valuations, particularly in the tech sector, outweighed optimism around expected U.S. interest rate cuts next month.】

item.title: 空中客车公司限制使用普惠发动机在寒冷天气起飞
item.description: 空中客车公司发言人周五表示，空中客车公司正在限制部分装有普惠发动机的飞机在极寒天气下的运营，这证实了行业出版物《航空电子期刊》（airterTELEGRAPH）早些时候的报道。【原文：Airbus is restricting operations in extreme cold for some aircraft equipped with Pratt & Whitney engines, an Airbus spokesperson said on Friday, confirming an earlier report by industry publication aeroTELEGRAPH.】

item.title: 经济不平衡将推动投资者黑色星期五选股
item.description: 当投资者关注 "黑色星期五 "商店的人流量时，他们将寻找一种不同的节日交易：在价格高昂、购物预算有限的混合经济中表现出色的零售商。【原文：As investors monitor crowd sizes at stores on Black Friday they will be shopping for a different kind of holiday deal: retailers that do well in a mixed economy characterized by high prices and limited shopping budgets.】

item.title: 全球最大珠宝商潘多拉迎接黑色星期五的激烈竞争
item.description: 全球销量最大的珠宝品牌潘多拉（Pandora）首席商务官周五表示，随着零售商在消费者信心疲软之际争相以折扣吸引购物者，预计今年黑色星期五的竞争将十分激烈。【原文：Pandora, the world's biggest jewellery brand by volume, expects fierce competition this Black Friday as retailers fight to lure shoppers with discounts at a time of weak consumer confidence, its chief commercial officer said on Friday.】

item.title: 供应膨胀将使 2026 年油价持续紧张
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，由于供应膨胀使温和的需求增长黯然失色，预计2026年油价将继续承压，而地缘政治风险可能会使油价跌幅扩大。【原文：Oil prices are projected to remain under pressure in 2026, as swelling supplies eclipse modest demand growth, while geopolitical risks could cap deeper losses, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 有关芝加哥商品交易所交易的重要信息
item.description: 全球最大的交易所运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团周五发生故障，导致其广受欢迎的货币平台以及外汇、大宗商品、国债和股票等期货交易停止。【原文：An outage at the world's biggest exchange operator CME Group on Friday halted trading on its popular currency platform and in futures spanning foreign exchange, commodities, Treasuries and stocks.】

item.title: Nexperia公司的中国母公司称，该公司的荷兰子公司寻求永久剥夺其控制权
item.description: 总部位于荷兰的 Nexperia 的中国母公司 Wingtech 周五表示，荷兰公司正在密谋建立非中国供应链，并永久剥夺其控制权。【原文：Wingtech , the Chinese parent company of Netherlands-based Nexperia, said on Friday that the Dutch unit was conspiring to create a non-Chinese supply chain and permanently strip it of its control.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美股企稳，投资者关注人工智能和经济动向
item.description: 未来一周，投资者将关注人工智能公司的盈利能力以及更广泛的经济健康状况，以稳定美国股市。【原文：Investors will look in the coming week for signals about profitability for artificial intelligence companies, as well as the broader economy's health, to steady the U.S. equity market.】

item.title: 黑色星期五悖论：购物者增多，美元减少
item.description: 黑色星期五 "是感恩节后的购物狂潮，吸引了大批讨价还价者前往商店购物，但今年的 "黑色星期五 "却面临着一个悖论：预计人流量将创下新高，但消费者的消费欲望却急剧下降。【原文：Black Friday, the post-Thanksgiving shopping frenzy that attracts throngs of bargain hunters to stores, faces a paradox this year: record crowds are expected, but consumers' appetite to spend has dropped sharply.】

item.title: 阿玛尼任命新董事会领导公司完成接班计划
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团阿玛尼周五表示，已任命了一个新的八人董事会，为家族代表保留了三个席位，并引入了业内资深高管马尔科-比扎里（Marco Bizzarri）、约翰-胡克斯（John Hooks）和米兰商人安杰洛-莫拉蒂（Angelo Moratti）。【原文：Italian luxury group Armani said on Friday it had appointed a new eight-member board, keeping three seats for representatives of the family and bringing in veteran industry executives Marco Bizzarri and John Hooks, and Milanese businessman Angelo Moratti.】

item.title: 消息人士称美国商务部在贸易谈判中要求控制瑞士投资
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，美国商务部在最近的贸易谈判中向瑞士施压，要求其承诺提供数十亿美元的投资，供华盛顿酌情分配，但遭到瑞士官员的拒绝。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department pressed Switzerland during recent trade talks to commit billions of dollars in investments that Washington could allocate at its discretion, but Swiss officials refused, according to two people familiar with the matter.】
